text: Abo abagatta ku Katonda ebintu ebirala baagamba singa Katonda yayagala ffe wadde bakadde baffe tetwandisinzizza kintu kirala netulekayo yye, era tetwandizizizza kintu kyonna kyataaziza, mu ngeri y'emu abaaliwo oluberyeberye lwabwe baakola batyo, abaffe ababaka baali balina kye bavunaanyizibwa okugyako okutuukiriza obubaka mu ngeri ennyinyonnyofu
